My Creative Process

All of my Front End Design and Devlopment projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that i am looking for

1

Plan ^ Strategize

  • Website Content
  • Website personality
  • Target Audience
  • Sitemap ^ Sections
2

Sketch

  • Raw Structure
  • Components
  • Layout pattern
3

Design ^ Build

  • HTML/CSS
  • Follow Design Guidelines
  • Front End Devlopment
  • Bac End Devlopment
4

Test ^ Optimize

  • Browser Support
  • Responsiveness
  • Optimize content
  • Test Performance
5

Launch

  • Deploying
  • Domain
  • Hosting
6

Maintain ^ Update

  • Update Over time
